Designed for Focus

Knowledge Mapping

Connect your mind.

Use Wiki-links to build your Second Brain. Link notes effortlessly using [[Title]] and navigate your personal knowledge web with zero friction.

Time Travel

Peace of mind, versioned.

Never fear the delete key again. GlassNotes automatically tracks your changes, allowing you to browse and restore any version of your note.

Visual Atmosphere

Writing as an art.

From the deep blues of Midnight to the warm hues of Sunset. Personalize your environment with premium themes.

Smart Organization

Folders that think.

Stay organized without the effort. Dynamic Smart Folders automatically group your notes by tags, status, or date ranges. Experience the future of file management in a native macOS shell.

Designed for the modern thinker.

Available now on macOS and coming soon to all your devices via the web.
